Wyatt

Share
Email Print Adoption Poster

Medium Male American Staffordshire Terrier Mix

Located in New South Wales

This little guy is a real cuddle bug. He will be energetic and strong, so obedience is a must, with this he will become a wonderful calm and confident member of the family and will love spending time indoors as well as outdoors. He will be ideal for an active family with or without children. A good size yard is preferable but not essential, a smaller yard is ok as long as you make time for daily walks and play time. He loves water and toys and get along very well with all his puppy playmates. Meal time is one of his favorite time of day and he is happy to share with all his puppy friends.
